{{Actor| | type = Quest item | name = Money | class = Gold10 | game = Strife | doomednum = 138 | convid = 169, 162, 166 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Coin|Coin]]→Gold10
A coin worth 10 gold. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Gold10 : {{Class|Coin}} { {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 10 {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_10GOLD" // "10 gold" {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_10GOLD" // "You picked up 10 gold." States { Spawn: CRED A -1 Stop } }
